system.requirements: Missionary or Arch-Militant. RT Rank 2+, Willpower 30+. Character is Initiated into the Vigil in the Fourth Cipher, and studied with other members to learn its ways.
system.descriptionText: A Group consisting of warriors of faith and former soldiers taught a philosphy of redemption. Such people seek those wayward psykers and witches lost from warmth the Emperor's light such that they may help return them to it. Often via a bullet to the skull.
system.effects:
Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Defender of the Fourth Cipher
Automatically Gain Unfaltering Redemption Unique Talent
Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Eternal Vigilance
